TopicTitle: is SQUAD going to revamp the asset management?

Articles.Content:
see... most of us get into ram issue because of mods; stock game alone is ~2G already... (thank god someone finally made a mod to address this lately)

i dont have much knowledge about computer programming, but

loading all the texture files into ram when the game loads sound pretty much a bad idea to begin with.

why dont they script it in a way that the game loads the texture on demand instead?
I dont get why they dont just load/stream it when ready like most other games do.. Surely that should be possible with unity??
